subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Increased capacity for assessing policy options for inclusive development (Employment-rich growth, social protection and MDG-consistent service delivery)  in light of long term trends and emerging threats through country studies, learning and policy advisory services.
subproject.title: INCLUSIVE DEVELOPMENT
